parameters.name: Dimensions
parameters.description:
The dimensions of the metric that you want to query. Valid values:

*   dataType: data type
*   productType: product type
*   instanceId: instance ID
*   instanceName: instance name
*   instanceType: instance type

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: IntervalInSec
parameters.description:
The time interval between data slices. Unit: seconds. Minimum value: 3600.

Valid values:

*   3600: 1 hour
*   86400: 1 day

parameters.name: Measures
parameters.description: The measures of the metric that you want to query.

parameters.name: Metric
parameters.description: The name of the metric. Valid value: USAGEFEE.STAT.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The order in which data is sorted. Valid value:

*   `ASC`: ascending order
*   `DESC`: descending order

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.description:
The dimension by which data is sorted.

Valid value:

*   dataType

    <!-- -->

    <!-- -->

    <!-- -->

parameters.name: QueryType
parameters.description:
The data type. Valid values:

*   instantQuery: non-time series
*   timeSeriesQuery: time series

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start of the time range to query. Unit: milliseconds.
